info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:13AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harding and northwestern Butte Counties through 500 AM MDT... At 412 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Gustave, or 35 miles southwest of Buffalo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redig, Gustave, East Short Pines and Crow Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
